name: Mobim
overview:
Mobim company holds an advanced mobile multimedia technology and offers a fluent transmission and play mode to customers in the 2.5/2.75G and 3G mobile network. They have improved anti-jamming and stability technologies than the traditional methods, and this will help mobile users to interactively enjoy the multimedia programs at any time and any place.

Mobim also launched â€œimichatâ€ mobile, which makes video chat possible. This is the first product in the world to realize video chat on the 2.5G wireless communication network. It realizes video chat in speech and brings you into a 3G period in the current network conditions. You can use any time and any place in the world and do not need not pay mobile wandering fee. Using the imichat mobile, you can see your friends all over the world and you will really feel that the world is so small.

Based on the imichat video chat function, they have added a new function in the imichat mobile. At the same time, they are developing the new products including the long-distance video surveillance and digital home theater and bring more excellent mobile multimedia products.
